summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates custom transpose implementations across a wide range of scenarios, including basic operations, conditional branches, recursion, JIT compilation, vector-Jacobian products, linear calls, nested structures, scalar-to-vector transformations, symmetry checks, and multiple transpose compositions.
business_intent: To guarantee the correctness and stability of custom transpose logic within automatic differentiation frameworks, providing developers with confidence that advanced features such as JIT, JVP, and linear calls behave as expected.
